item.title: memory
item.description: Computer memory is a series of switches (similar to the switchboard in a house). Each switch is identified by a number and is either on or off.

item.title: unicode
item.description: Unicode Other non roman languages greek, arabic, chinese, hebrew, japanese, thai etc. atrology symbols emoji etc Unicode developed by the Unicode Consortium coordinated with ISO/IEC 10646 a 21-bit code with 144,697 characters from 159 scripts unicode maps from character numbers (code points) into glyphs (graphical representations) Some(many) are reserved
